Class InboxController

  • java.lang.Object
    • InboxController

  • public class InboxController
extends java.lang.Object
    For taking in user inputs for viewing chat history and replying to messages.
    Author:
    Chrisee, Elliot

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InboxController(Registrar reg, java.lang.String username, InboxPresenter ip, OutboxController oc)
      Initiates a new InboxController

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void chatViewer(ChatroomManager cm, java.lang.String recipient)
      Prompts the user for whether they want to reply (if able) or whether they want to exit the chat.
      void promptChatChoice()
      Prompts the user to choose a chatlog from a list of existing chatlogs by username.
      void promptReply(java.lang.String recipient)
      Prompts the user for a reply to be sent into the current chat.

    • Method Detail

      • promptChatChoice

        public void promptChatChoice()
        Prompts the user to choose a chatlog from a list of existing chatlogs by username.

      • chatViewer

        public void chatViewer(ChatroomManager cm,
                       java.lang.String recipient)
        Prompts the user for whether they want to reply (if able) or whether they want to exit the chat.
        Parameters:
        cm - ChatroomManager
        recipient - username of a user that the logged in user has chatted with

      • promptReply

        public void promptReply(java.lang.String recipient)
        Prompts the user for a reply to be sent into the current chat.
